snippet: The deal, which provides billions in compensation to churches for property seized by the former Communist government, threatened to topple the coalition government earlier this week.
abstract: Czech government agrees to pay billions of dollars in compensation to churches for property seized by the former Communist government.
lead_paragraph: The deal, which provides billions in compensation to churches for property seized by the former Communist government, threatened to topple the coalition government earlier this week.

headline.main: Czech Republic: Churches to Get Restitution for Seized Property
headline.print_headline: Czech Republic: Churches to Get Restitution for Seized Property
